name: Drive Goat Manage City rush Simulator
name_original: Drive Goat Manage City rush Simulator
description:
Drive goat simulator is the latest in goat simulation technology, bringing next-gen goat simulation to YOU. You no longer have to fantasize about being a goat, your dreams have finally come true!
You can be a goat
Get points for wrecking stuff - brag to your friends that you're the Drive goat
MILLIONS OF BUGS! We're only eliminating the crash-bugs, everything else is hilarious and we're keeping it.
